Name: Lightning
Description: You command lightning to slam down into a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 thunder damage, and all creatures within a 10ft radius circle must make a PHY save or take 2d8 thunder damage and be pushed 5ft away from the impact zone.

Name: Neurotoxin
Description:
You inject a creature with neurotoxin, causing them to be poisoned for one minute. 
While poisoned like this, whenever they take damage, they must make a PHY save or be stunned until the end of their next turn.

Name: Firebolt
Description: You point toward a creature and a bolt of fire shoots towards them. Make a range spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage.

Name: Sense Magic
Description:
You magically heighten your awareness of magic in your surrounding, causing you to smell and hear the presence of magical objects and effects. You can see dim light and shimmering around the objects and areas of effect. You can make an arcana check to determine the magical properties or effects.
Magical objects and effects can still be hidden if concealed by powerful magic.

Name: Mass Confusion
Description: You conjure a mass of noice, visuals and vibrations. Up to 5 creatures of your choosing must make a Con save or be confused for 1 minute. The creatures may repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.

Name: Extinguish Light
Description: Blackness emanates from a point of your choosing within range, extinguishing all light, natural and magical, within a 30ft sphere.

Name: Acid Armor
Description: Imbue yourself with a layer of acid. You gain temporary hit points equal to 4x the mana spent. Damage taken from melee attackers are returned x2 in acid damange

Name: Elemental Weapon
Description:
You brandish a weapon with an element of your choice until the end of the next round, causing any attack with it to deal an extra 1d6 (2d6 for projectiles) damage of that type.
You can spend 2 mana to increase the damage by 1d6 (2d6 for projectiles).

Name: Inspiration
Description: You inspire one of your allies with words of encouragement, giving them a 1d6 to add to any roll until the end of the next round.

Name: Fireblast
Description: You reach out your palm and fire spews out from it in a 15ft cone. Each creature in the cone must make a AGI save or take 3d10 fire damage.

Name: Ice Blast
Description: You blast ice cold fog out in a 15ft cone in front of you. All creatures in the area must make a PHY save or take 4d6 cold damage.

Name: Spectral Blade
Description:
You conjure a spectral blade within range and makes an attack with it at a target. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d4 magic damage. 
On a supporting action, you can move the blade up to 20ft in any direction

Name: Counterspell
Description: You lash out with magical force at an enemy as they cast a spell. Roll a spell check to stop the spell from taking effect. The DC is equal to twice the mana used in the casting. If the spell is within your spellcasting ability or domain, you gain bonuses of +2 and +3 to the roll, respectively.

Name: Water spray
Description: You powerfully spray water at a target within range. Make a range spell attack. On a hit the target takes 1d4 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 ft.

Name: Septic Wound
Description: You touch the wound of a creature causing sepsis in it. Whenever the target is hit by an attack, it takes an extra 1d12 poison damage.

Name: Heal
Description: You channel your divine power and reach out to your allies. You have a healing pool of 10d10 + 10 health points you can freely divide to your allies.

Name: Fireball
Description: You point a finger towards a point within range. I small bolt of fire streaks towards the point. As it reaches the point, it explodes in a 20ft radius ball of fire. Each creatures caught in the blast must make a AGI save or take 6d10 fire damage.

Name: Shadow Bolt
Description: You hurl a magical bolt of shadow energy at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 necrotic damage.

Name: Divine Shield
Description: You brandish a radiant divine shield, lightning up an area of 30ft around you. You gain +5 AC until the end of the next round.

Name: Divine Protection
Description:
You imbue a creature with divine protection reducing their damage taken by half until the end of the next round.
You can imbue one more target for every 3 extra mana spent.

Name: Conjure food
Description: You conjure delicious food out of thin air. The amount of food is equal to one days ration. You can create one more ration for every 2 mana spent.

Name: Blizzard
Description:
A dark, blue cloud gathers above you, and a blizzard in an area of a 30ft radius circle within range appears. The area is heavily obscured and difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must succeed in a Phy save or take 10d6 cold damage. 
You can spend 4 mana to move the area up to 30ft as a supporting action or an action. Enemies caught in the area must make the save again.

Name: Fear
Description: You look into the eyes of a creature, attempt to induce fear into its mind. They must succeed in a Con save or be frightened of you for 1 minute. They may repeat this save at the end of each of their turn.

Name: Blind/Deafen
Description: You create an intense sound or sight (your choice) close to a creature within range. The target must succeed in a Con save or be blinded or deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn.

Name: Annihilation Ray
Description: You shoot out a ray of pure magical energy. On a hit, the target takes 12d8 + 12 magic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, their body and soul is annihilated.

Name: Silence
Description:
You magically nullify all sound within a 20ft radius sphere within range.
You can spend 3 mana to move the sphere 20ft in any direction as a Supporting action

Name: Illusion
Description: You conjure an illusion contained in a small space. Creatures can make a INT save or check to realize that the effect is an illusion

Name: Radiant Bolt
Description: You hurl a bolt of radiant energy at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit the target takes 2d8 radiant damage and is vulnerable to radiant damage until the end of the next turn.

Name: Frost Nova
Description: Ice cold mist shoots out from you. Each creature within 10ft must make a PHY save or take 1d6 cold damage and be rooted. All creatures hit by the mist can not make opportunity attacks until the start of the next round

Name: Clearvoyance
Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location you know. You can see and hear as if you were there, but the sensor cannot move.

Name: Holy Water
Description: You imbue water with your divine mana and pour it over a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 radiant damage, only if it is an undead.

Name: Magical Key
Description: You sense the structure of a lock within range and create a magical spectral key perfectly fitting the lock

Name: Gravitational Manipulation
Description:
You manipulate the forces of nature in a 30ft cube within range. Creatures in the area must make a PHY save or be affected by your manipulation. Choose between the following effects:
Remove gravity: Causing the creatures to levitate in the cube.
Toss creatures: You can toss the creatures 30ft in any direction, or 20ft straight up
Magnify gravity: Knocking the creatures prone
Collapse: Pulling the creatures towards the center and crushing dem, dealing 8d8 bludgeoning damage

Name: Haunting spirit
Description:
You infuse the soul of a target with the tormenting of a haunted spirit from a lost world. The target must succeed in an Con save or take 4d8 necrotic damage. The target must make the save again at the start of its turn, breaking the spell on a success, and taking damage on a failure. 
If the target is reduced to 0 hit points while the spell is active, you can move it to a new target within range as a reaction or supporting action with no mana cost.

Name: Necrotic Touch
Description: You reach out and touch a creature, magically ripping the muscle from their bones. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 6d8 necrotic damage and must make a CON save or be frightened of you until the end of the next round.

Name: Psychic Screech
Description: You mentally produce a deafening screech heard by 3 creatures of your choice within range. The targets must make a INT save or take 4d12 damage and are deafened. They may repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.

Name: Ice Spear
Description:
You conjure a spear of Ice and hurl it at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d10 piercing damage.
Hit or miss, when it reaches the target the spear explodes. The target and all creatures in a 30ft cone behind it must make a Agi save or take 4d6 cold damage.

Name: Mass Charm
Description: You attempt to charm up to 7 creatures that can see you. They must make a CON save or be charmed by you. Creatures hostile to you have advantage on the save.

Name: Dragons breath
Description: You imbue yourself with the dragons breath of a dragon type of your knowledge. For the duration, you can make a breath attack as an action. The breath weapon recharges on a 5 or 6 on a 1d6 roll.

Name: Summon spores
Description: You throw 3 spores on the ground within range. Whenever a creature moves adjacent to a spore, it explodes. Each target within 10ft of the spore must make a PHY save or take 4d12 poison damage.

Name: Fly
Description: You touch a creature, giving them the ability to magically fly for 10 minutes. The flying speed is 90ft per round.

Name: Raise Dead
Description: Select corpses of creatures up to a combined level of 7. You raise these corpses as undead servants. They follow your command. If they are exposed to sunlight, the spell breaks.

Name: Fissure
Description:
You pull apart the ground in front of you, and molten lava fills the 15ft by 60ft fissure. Each creature within 5 ft of the edges of the fissure must make a Phy save or take 6d10 fire damage.
If a creature were to cross the fissure less than 30ft above it, it takes 4d10 fire damage, no save.

Name: Dispell Magic
Description: You reach out and attempt to remove a magical property or effect within range. Roll a spell check against the DC equal to twice the mana spent on the property or effect.

Name: Absorb Elements
Description: Absorb half of the elemental damage taken. On your next turn, you can spend 1/4 of the damage absorbed in mana to unleash that elemental power in an elemental ray.

Name: Lightningbolt
Description: You shoot a lightning bolt at an enemy. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage.

Name: Locate Object
Description: You attempt to locate an object that you know of, or have heard of. Make a spell check. On a save you know the direction and the distance to the object (GM discression)

Name: Mind Storm
Description: You reach out to up to 7 minds in a 15ft radius around you. Creating utter chaos in their minds, ripping away their thoughts and emotions. Each target must make a INT save or take 12d4 psychic damage.

Name: Acid Spray
Description: Adic sprays from your hand in a ray. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 acid damage

Name: Psychic insult
Description: You insult an enemy out of nowhere. The target must make a CON save or take 1d4 psychic damage. The next attack against the target has a +2 to hit.

Name: Virulent Plague
Description:
You throw a dead frog at a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target is affected by a plague for the duration of the spell, or until you lose focus. 
At the start of its each of its turns, it must succeed in a PHY save or take 2d12 poison damage. The damage increases each time the target fails the save.
If the spell lasts its duration, the target is permanently affected by the plague, taking 1d12 poison damage every morning, reducing its hit point maximum.

Name: Magic Armor
Description: You brandish yourself in a magic armor, giving you a +2 to AC and resistance to Magic damage.

Name: Magic Spear
Description: You gather your magical energy and hurl it at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 8d4 magic damage, and all creatures in a 30ft line behind them takes the same damage.

Name: Hallucination
Description: You create a hallucination in a creatures mind. They must succeed in an Int save to realize it is not real. On a failed save, they believe what they hallucinate is true, and they take the damage they would have taken from the real thing in the form of psychic damage

Name: Resurrection
Description:
As part of a Ritual, you attempt to resurrect a target. 
See resurrection rules for suggestions to how to handle this.

Name: Telepathy
Description: You can telepathically communicate with a target of your choice

Name: Brain Burn
Description: You force your mind into another creatures mind, causing their thoughts to start to burn the insides of their brain. They must succeed in a Con save or take 6d4 psychic damage.

Name: Thunderous Fists
Description: Touch a creature, brandishing their fists with thunderous energy. Each melee attack they make deal an additional 1d8 lightning damage.

Name: Magical Speech
Description: Select a language you have heard of. You can read, speak and understand this language fluently.

Name: Curse
Description:
You attempt to curse an enemy. The target must succeed in a Cha save or be cursed for 1 minute. The cursed has a -5 to all ability rolls.
The cursed can repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn, breaking the curse on a successful save. If the curse is not broken before the duration completes, it becomes permanent in one random ability score.

Name: Acid Rain
Description:
A dark, green cloud gathers above you, and acid rain pours down on a 20ft radius circle within range. Creatures in the area must succeed in a Phy save or take 6d12 acid damage. 
You can spend 4 mana to move the area up to 30ft as a supporting action or an action. Enemies caught in the area must make the save again.

Name: Magical Trap
Description:
You cast this spell together with another spell. Storing the other spell behind a physical or magical mechanism. Triggering the mechanism will trigger the stored spell. The casting takes 1 minute.
You can spend 2 extra mana to double the duration, with possibilities of stacking.

Name: Poison Dart
Description: You shoot a poisonous dart at a target. Make a ranges spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 piercing damage, and must make a PHY save or take 1d12 poison damage.

Name: Sacred Aura
Description: Create a sacred aura in a 15ft radius around you. Whenever an enemy enters the aura for the first time in a round they must make a Cha save or take 2d8 radiant damage.

Name: Wall of Fire
Description: You conjure a 15ft hight 5ft by 60ft heavily obscured flaming wall within range. Each creature adjacent to the wall must make a AGI save or take 6d10 fire damage.

Name: Corrosive Ray
Description: You unleash a ray of corrosive hot liquid towards a target. On a hit the target takes 6d6 acid damage. If the target is wearing armor, the liquid melts it, reducing its armor class by 1 at the start of the targets turn. The target may attempt to remove the acid with a Agi save.

Name: Sacred Flame
Description: Sacred energy shoots down from the skies at a target within range. The target must make a AGI save or take 1d6 radiant damage.

Name: Slow Fall
Description: You drastically slow the descent of up to 5 falling creatures and objects.

Name: Inspiring Speech
Description: You inspire up to 4 of your allies with a speech. Each of you allies has a +4 to attack rolls and saving throws until the start of your next turn.

Name: Thunderstorm
Description:
A dark, gray cloud gathers above you, and shoots down at a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 thunder damage, and all creatures within a 10ft radius circle must make a PHY save or take 2d8 thunder damage and be pushed 5ft away from the impact zone. 
You can make lightning attacks as a Supporting action and action.

Name: Meteor
Description: You redirect a massive body in the cosmos to a point you can see within range. On your next turn the meteor slams into an are of a 50ft radius circle. All creatures in the area must make a AGI save or take 8d12 bludgeoning damage and 8d10 fire damage.

Name: Gust of wind
Description: You summon a gust of wind in a 30ft line or 15ft cone starting from you. Each creature in the area must make a PHY save or be knocked prone or pushed 10ft away from you, your choice

Name: Quicksand
Description: You alter the ground in a 20ft square or 40ft by 10ft line within range. The ground becomes difficult terrain and creatures that starts or ends their turn in the area must succeed in a PHY save or be rooted. Rooted creatures may use an action to pull themselves free from the quicksand.

Name: Lightning Ball
Description:
You conjure a 10ft radius lighting ball from the static electricity in the air within range. Each creature within or adjacent to the ball must make a PHY save or take 3d8 thunder damage.
As a supporting action, you may move the ball up to 20ft in any direction. Any creature that is hit by, or adjacent, to the lightning ball on its route must make a PHy save or take 3d8 thunder damage.

Name: Magic Shield
Description: You conjure a 15ft square barrier of anti-magic energy until the end of the next round. The barrier blocks all incoming Magic damage and grants a +2 bonus to saving throws against effects from the other side of the shield.

Name: Magicbolt
Description: You hurl a bolt of magical mana at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit the target takes 1d4 magic damage.

Name: Alter Person
Description: You alter a person, changing their appearances into another person of the same race and gender. The alteration is detectable by detect magic, and an investigation check against your spell save DC.

Name: Suggestion
Description: You make a suggestion to what a target should do. The target must succeed in a Cha save or follow the suggestion within reason. The target can make a new save at the end of each of their turns.

Name: Control Elements
Description: You take control of a non-controlled body of an element in a 10ft cube area, allowing you to move, shape or change it. This could be making a passage in a wall, freezing a small body of water, or putting out minor flames.

Name: Blink
Description: Your body instantly disappears into a tiny blink, reappearing in a location you can see within range.

Name: Flare
Description: You spark a huge magical flare in a 15ft cube within range. Creatures in the area must make a AGI save or be partly blinded and lit up like a torch. Attackers has a +2 to attack roll against these creatures, and they have a -2 to attack rolls.

Name: Teleport
Description: As a ritual, you teleport to a location you know, or to a teleportation circle you have learned about.

Name: Poison Cloud
Description: You conjure a poisonous cloud covering an area of a 30ft radius sphere. The cloud is lightly obscured, and each creature within it must make a PHY save or take 4d12 poison damage. On a supporting action, you can spend 1 mana to move the cloud up to 15ft in any direction.

Name: Earthquake
Description: You slam your hands deep into the ground, shaking it violently. An earthquake rattles an area 60ft around you, becoming difficult terrain. All creatures other than you in the area must make a Phy save ord take 5d6 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

Name: Light
Description: You touch an object, and it lights up with bright light up to 30ft.

Name: Grasp of the dead
Description: Hands of long dead miserable souls reach up from the ground in a 20ft radius circle within range. Creatures in the area must succeed in a PHY save or be grappled for the duration. They may repeat the save at the start of their next turn. The area becomes difficult terrain.

Name: Eye of Odin (Historical eye)
Description: You peer into the past through Odins eye on an event of your choosing. Make a spell check to see if it is the truth you are seeing.

Name: Tornado
Description: You summon a tornado with a cylinder of 20ft radius and 80ft height. The tornado has a speed of 60ft per round. Creatures caught in the tornado must make a PHY save or be thrown 60ft in a random direction, taking 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Huge+ creatures are thrown 30ft and take 4d6 bludgeoning damage.

Name: Invisible grip
Description: Roll a range spell attack as you magically choke a creature. On a hit, they take 6d4 magic damage, and are grappled.

Name: Dissolving Touch
Description: You magically turn your hand into a boiling lump of searing acid as you reach out and touch an object or creature. On a hit the target takes 4d6 acid damage. If the target is wearing armor, the liquid melts it, reducing its armor class by 1 at the start of the targets turn. The target may attempt to remove the acid with a Agi save.

Name: Fog Cloud
Description:
Fog spreads out in a 30ft sphere from a point within range. The area is heavily obscured.
As a supporting action, you may move the fog up to 20ft in any direction.

Name: Corpse Explosion
Description: You target a corpse within range, causing it to bloat and explode from the poisonous gasses built up. Creatures within 15ft of the corpse must succeed in a PHY save or take 6d12 poison damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. At the start of their turn, they must repeat the saving throw or take another 3d12 poison damage. On a successful save, they are no longer poisoned.

Name: Mirror Image
Description: You duplicate yourself 2 times. Your duplicates behave exactly like you, and you can control what they do, but they deal no damage and cannot interact with anything physically. A creature can make an INT check against your spell save DC in an attempt to recognize the real you.

Name: Ice Armor
Description: Imbue yourself with an armor of Ice, giving you +3 AC. Whenever a melee attacker hits you, they take 1d6 cold damage, their movement is reduced by 10ft, and they cannot make any more attacks. This lasts until the start of the next round.

Name: Mass Illusion
Description: You create a massive illusion. Creatures can make a INT save or check to realize that the effect is an illusion

Name: Challenge
Description: You yell out a challenge to an enemy. If the target understands you, it must make a CHA save or accept your challenge of arms. The target will do whatever in its power to defeat you. It may make the save again at the end of their turn.

Name: Shadow Cloud
Description:
Natural shadows gathers in a 20ft radius sphere of lightly obscured shadow. Creatures within must make a PHY save or take 2d8 necrotic damage and have their physicality reduced by 5 while they are in the cloud. 
Creatures that ends their turn within the cloud must make the save again, taking 2d8 necrotic damage, and having their physicality reduced by 5 on a failed save.

Name: Summon Monster
Description: You summon a monster of a type of your choosing up to a level of 9. The monster follows your commands as long as you hold focus. If you hold focus for the duration, the monster disappears. If you lose focus, the monster is no longer under your control, and acts on their own behalf.

Name: Divine Spear
Description: You channel your divine energy into a spear and hurl it towards a target. On a hit the target takes 6d8 radiant damage. All creatures within 5ft of the path of spear must succeed in a AGI save or take 3d8 radiant damage.

Name: Sunburst
Description: You summon a light with the power of the sun. Each undead within 60ft must succeed in a PHY save or take 6d8 radiant damage.

Name: Leach Life
Description:
You reach into the very essence of a creatures life force, and starts to drain it. The creature must make a PHY save or take 5d8 necrotic damage, healing you for half the damage dealt.
You can repeat this attack every turn without spending mana, as long as you maintain focus.

Name: Hold Creature
Description:
You reach out to the mind of a creature to hold it in place. The target must make a Con save, or be paralyzed for the duration. The target can make the save again at the start of their turn.
Larger creatures are more resilient to the spell.

Name: Acid Nova
Description: Acid sprays out from you, reaching all creatures within 30ft not fully behind cover. Creatures in the area must succeed in a Phy check or take 5d6 acid damage.

Name: Charm
Description: You attempt to charm a creature. The target must succeed in a Con save or be charmed by you, viewing you as a friend. Creatures that are hostile to you has advantage on the save.

Name: Beacon of Judgement
Description:
You put up a holy beacon radiating divine energy. At the start of their turn, enemies within 20ft must succeed in a PHY save or take 4d10 radiant damage.
At the start of their turn, allies within the beacon regain 1d10 hit points.
Undead creatures can not enter the range of the beacon.

Name: Divine Blessing
Description:
You bless up to 3 creatures of your choice within range. The chosen creatures are blessed with adding a 1d4 to any ability roll for the duration.
You can bless one more creature for every extra mana spent.

Name: Zeal
Description: You touch a creature giving it a vigor of life. The target gains an additional weapon attack, 10 extra feet of movement speed and can make two supporting actions and two reactions each round.

Name: Divine Touch
Description: You touch a creature, healing it for 1d8 health points.

Name: Psychic Dagger
Description:
You get eye contact with a target within range and mime that you are pulling out a dagger and stabbing them. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 12d4 psychic damage. 
The target must make a INT save, or they believe that you still have the dagger, and can attack you again the next round

Name: Invisibility
Description: You touch a creature and it becomes invisible of 10 minutes. If the target makes an attack or cast a spell, the spell breaks.

Name: Frostbolt
Description:
You shoot out a bolt of frost at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 damage, and their speed is reduced by 5ft until the start of your next turn.
When upcast, the speed reduction increases by 5ft for every 2 mana spent

Name: Magic Nova
Description: Pure energy shoots out from you. Each creature within 15ft takes 8d4 magic damage

Name: Thunderwave
Description: You release a powerful pulse of lightning in a 15ft square. Each creature in the area must make a PHY save or take 2d8 lightning damage.

Name: Grasping Vines
Description: Vines shoot out from the ground or objects in a 20ft square within range. Creatures within must make a PHY save or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and be grappled for the duration. They may repeat the save at the start of their next turn.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: You telekinetically move a creature or object with the power of 250lbs a distance of 10ft.

Name: Conjure glacier
Description: A spiky glacier shoots out from the ground, a wall or roof, 15ft high and covering an area of 30ft by 10ft. Enemies in or adjacent to the area must succeed in a AGI save or take 3d10 piercing damage and 4d6 cold damage.

Name: Shadow touch
Description: You reach out and touch a target. Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and have their physicality reduced to 1 until the end of the next round.

Name: Prayer
Description: You say a prayer to your patron, and you and your allies are blessed with healing equal to 2d8 health points each.

Name: Chain Lightning
Description:
You point your finger at a target, lightning zapping out from it. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit the target takes 6d8 lightning damage. You can force the lightning to jump to additional creatures within 10ft of each other. If the attack roll beat their AC, they are linked in a lightning chain. You can spend mana to extend the reach of each link by 5ft per mana.
When the link is complete, roll a number of d8s equal to the number of creatures in the link. All of them takes damage equal to this sum in lightning damage.

Name: Ray of Frost
Description: You shoot out a ray of freezing water at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 cold damage.

Name: Divine Rest
Description: You and up to 4 allies instantly gain a long rest.

Name: Enlarge/Reduce
Description: You touch a creature, increasing or decreasing its size by a magnitude of 1. Any base damage with a melee weapon is increased by one tier.

Name: Soul Lantern
Description: You light an etherial lantern emitting a 15ft light. Corpses hit by the glow do not decay and cannot rise as undead. Magical objects and enchantments emit a faint aura.

Name: Veil of Shadows
Description: You weave shadows and silence around yourself and your allies, cloaking your presence. You all gain a +5 to Stealth checks and you dont leave any tracks, scents or magical traces, other than the casting of this spell.

Name: Reanimate corpse
Description: When you cast this spell on the remnants of a creature, it temporarily awakens with the ability to hear and speak. The creature has all its memories from its past life. After the creature has heard five questions and answered them, the creature returns to its infinite rest. You cannot cast this spell again on the same creature until the next eclipse.

Name: Restoration
Description: You touch a creature removing sickness, exhaustion or a condition.

Name: Borrowed Mask
Description: You magically alter your face, voice, and form slightly. You cannot change race, size, or equipment, but you can pass for another person. An INT (Investigation) check vs. your spell save DC reveals the illusion.

Name: Ward of the Watcher
Description: You inscribe a sigil on the ground or an entrance. While active, you instantly know if any hostile creature enters the warded area.

Name: Arcane Probe
Description: You focus on a creature you know, or a place you have been and create an Arcane Probe. You are able to see and hear as if you were there and move the probe around with a movement speed of 30ft. If the target was a person that is in movement, the probe automatically follows the person. The Probe is invisible to the naked eye, but visible through sence magic.

Name: Banish
Description: A creature must make a Cha save or be banished to a realm of your choosing. You must either have control over the realm, or have a realmstone to. If the creature is native to this realm, the creature is permanently banished and no focus is needed to keep it there.

Name: Visage of Judgement
Description: Your eyes light up as you stare into the eyes of a creature. They must make a Cha save or will see the Visage of Judgement through your eyes. For the duration, they cannot tell any lies.

Name: Beastify person
Description: Give a person a part of a beasts appearance and functionality. This could be a hounds nose to improve smell, gills to allow for breathing underwater, darkvision, etc. The modification does not change the movement possibilities of the person.

Name: Plant Growth
Description: You pour your magical energy into roots and plants around you, creating an instant massive growth within 120ft. The ground becomes difficult terrain for the next 24 hours. After these 24 hours, the growth continues outwards, giving new life and energy to the surrounding area.

Name: Eyes of the Sun
Description: Your eyes light up as the sun and spews light in a 60ft cone in front of you. The light dispels magical darkness in its area and counts as true sunlight for creatures caught in it.
